record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 10, 2007)

[Page: H11464]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, due to a family health emergency, I was unable to be present for rollcall votes 949-958 on Tuesday, October 9, through Wednesday, October 10, 2007. Had I been present, I would have voted in the following manner: "yea" on rollcall votes 949, 950, 951, 952, 953, 954, 955, 958, 960; "nay" on rollcall votes 956, 957, 959.
